17/*
18 * Return the address of the last file name component of NAME.
19 * If NAME ends in a slash, return the empty string.
20 */
21
22#include <string.h>
23
24static inline const char *last_path_component(char const *name)
25{
26 char const *slash = strrchr(name, '/');
27
28 return (slash) ? slash + 1 : name;
29}
30
